ScenarioDef.label: Resident Evil
ScenarioDef.description: Horrific murders have been occuring in the countryside. Your squad was sent in after the loss of alpha team. Eliminate all threats.

scenario.summary: Bring a team of armed soldiers to investigate a mansion filled with surprises. Can you survive long enough to eliminate the threats inside?

li.text: You are part of a special operations team that has been assigned to investigate a string of reported murders in the nearby region. Your job is to eliminate this threat to the public and return home safe.
